creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: Earth Spirit with human head and removable flame halo. ca. 725 A.D. Glazed pottery tomb figure, one of a pair, on a deep cylindrical base with mottled glaze. The figure is predominantly blue, with white areas. Head and halo unglazed.
medium: White earthenware with three-color lead glaze
title: Tomb retinue earth spirit
